committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: A bill to grant the consent of the Congress to the Western Low-Level Waste Disposal Compact.
short_title: Western Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact Consent Act

summary.text: Interstate Compact - Western Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact Consent Act- Grants congressional approval to the Western Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact which provides for cooperation among the States of South Dakota, Arizona, and any other eligible State in the management of low-level radioactive waste.

titles.title: Western Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact Consent Act
A bill to grant the consent of the Congress to the Western Low-Level Waste Disposal Compact.
